page.title: 01Introduction.
page.content: {Land:}Mainly farmland.The area has many farms,the average farm has about three hundred acres.The farms are arable,dairy and mixed farms.The River Wiske flows through one of the villages.It feeds into the River Swale and it is polluted. {Transport:}The main line from London to Edinburgh runs through the area.It is a fast stretch of line and the high speed train was tested here.There are a few buses for the area.{ {Villages:}There are three villages in our area.They are called Newby Wiske,South Otterington and Thornton le Moor.There are small village schools at two villages.Each village has about eighty houses and three hundred people.There are Public Houses at South Otterington and Thornton le Moor and a shop at Newby Wiske.The Police Headquarters is at Newby Wiske.
